description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Pleasanter 1.3.49.0 and earlier contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If an attacker tricks the user to access the product with a specially crafted URL and perform a specific operation, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.

Pleasanter 1.3.49.0 y anteriores contienen una vulnerabilidad de cross-site scripting. Si un atacante engaña al usuario para que acceda al producto con una URL especialmente manipulada y realice una operación específica, se puede ejecutar un script arbitrario en el navegador web del usuario.
